summary.para: Creates a font face object for the font.

param.name: fontFace
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
This method returns DWRITE_E_REMOTEFONT if it could not construct a remote font.

summary.para: Compares two instances of font references for equality.

param.name: font
param.para: A pointer to a interface for the other font instance to compare to this font instance.

returns.para: Returns whether the two instances of font references are equal. Returns TRUE if the two instances are equal; otherwise, FALSE.

summary.para: Gets a font face reference that identifies this font.

param.name: fontFaceReference
param.para: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to a interface for the newly created font face reference object.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Gets the current locality of the font.

returns.para: Returns the current locality of the font.

remarks.para: For fully local files, the result will always be DWRITE_LOCALITY_LOCAL. A downloadable file may be any of the states, and this function may change between calls.

summary.para: Represents a font in a font collection.
